definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: This medicine was extracted from the gallbladder of snakes.
sentences.chinese: 藥劑是用蛇膽提煉而成的。

sentences.english: Then, there is snake gall and blood mixed in liquor that supposedly will brighten your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 那裏還有一種混入蛇膽和蛇血的酒，據說可以明目。

sentences.english: HPLC method for determination of hesperidin in Shedan Chenpi capsules was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了測定蛇膽陳皮膠囊中橙皮苷的HPLC法。

sentences.english: Then there are also snake gall and blood mixed in liquor which supposedly will brighten your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 而且，蛇膽和蛇血混合而製成的酒據說有明目的作用。

definition: Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
lit. the disease is cured the moment the medicine is taken (idiom)/fig. (of a medical treatment) to give instant results/(of a solution or method) highly effective
mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
